name: {GAME:INVALID}
description:
Please play valid game first at: https://drunk-puppy.itch.io/valid

     Hi, there! Co-Creator of Drunkpuppy, Stygian Hero, bringing you the 2nd (technically 1st) game from Drunkpuppy Studios! In this game, you must save validity as a baby whose only power is some flippers that help it jump.

This game was created for the Invalid Jam 2020-2021

Keep Gaming,  -Me

Or don't, I don't care

P.S. The 'Maost' line is an inside joke.
